short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export reply & comment list of any x/twitter tweets to CSV/Excel/JSON.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract replies & comment list of any tweet, Save reply content and user info list to CSV / Excel / JSON.

HOW TO USE?
1. Enter a Tweet link
2. Click the start button

TwReplyExport uses the Twitter website to load tweet replies. There is some limit on websites, Twitter does not always show all replies on the website.
